title: Lock Stock & Barrel Pucka Grooming Creme For Men 100 g
features: Pucka Grooming Creme is part of Lock Stock & Barrel’s unrivalled collection of award-winning blends for men, designed to give endless styling options.
Workable style with a medium, pliable hold and natural finish.
Washes out easily with water. Vegetarian friendly. Leaping Bunny certified. Paraben-free and Phthalate-free.
Rub between fingers, apply to damp or dry hair. Avoid contact with eyes.
Size: 3.53 oz / 100 g jar with screw top lid.
description: This highly pliable, light styling creme gives the hair amazing volume and adds life to any style. This no look creme give an invisible, light to medium hold with a natural shine. Great for creating pliable styles with a versatile, natural texture.

Ingredients – Water (Aqua) (Eau), Petrolatum, Cera alba, Glyceryl stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Phenyltrimethicone, Cetearyl alcohol, Behentrimonium methosulphate, Ozokerite, Isopropyl myristate, PVP, PVP/VA, Phenoxyethanol, Isopropyl paraben, Butyl paraben, Isobutyl paraben, Parfum, Citral, Citronellol, Hexyl cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Hydroxycitronellal.
